entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump Mail in taxes have been working for decades. Mail in elections are safer and secure in the setting of coronavirus.       Maybe if we all signed up and each one taking our turn a slapping you in the face you’d understand how America does not want you in our White House #TrumpTrash
